page.title: 06ONE DAY IN THE LIFE OF MUM
page.content: My mum wakes at 7.10am and listens to the news. she gets up at 7.30am and has her breakfast which comprises cereal, a cup of tea and slice of toast with marmalade on it. After this she gets dressed and prepares all the lunches. She clears the table and puts the dishes in the dishwasher. When we are all ready mum gives us a lift to school before going to one of her clinics to see her patients. She is a Speech Therapist and deals with people who have lisps or stammers. She works from 9.00am through to 2.30pm with an hour break for lunch. At 5.00pm she takes my brother and sister to their clubs. After collecting them she either watches television or has an evening out.
